name: Teknisk Puts 1 | Crops - Rolf Eneström
description:
Welcome to Crops by Rolf Eneström

Go to the neighbour to see what they want and grow those crops for them. The different crops have their own planting-area which are marked with their respective signs. Pick up the crops in time so they dont rot, but don't worry you can still use the rotten crops in the compost bin to make fertilizer.

You can buy upgrades with the money you earn by selling your crops by pressing E on your keyboard to open ub the shop menu. 

Walk Speed - Enhances the movement speed of the player.

Water Level - Increases the amount of water the player can carry.

Marketing - Plus one neighbour you can sell crops to. Up to 4 neighbours.

Grow Speed - The plants grow faster.

The game is infinite, there is no specific goal more than to have fun while playing!

Hope you enjoy :D
